%project_settings_platform_group1_descri: Project settings pertaining to the software overall
%project_settings_platform_isEditable_de: Whether this project is editable. A project that is not editable is sometimes called a resource.
%project_settings_platform_textDirection: Which way the project's text flows. 'ltr' = left-to-right; 'rtl' = right-to-left. '' or undefined = left-to-right (may be changed in the future to detect). Defaults to ''. This is generally derived from the language definition for the project's language code. Note that additional string options may be added in the future, so handle accordingly. Adding additional options will not be considered a breaking change.
%project_settings_project_group1_descrip: Settings pertaining to the selected project
%settings_defaultMessage_noSettingsForTh: No settings available for this project.
%settings_errorMessages_errorOccurred%: An error occurred while updating the setting
%settings_platform_comments_enabled_desc: Whether reading and writing comments in projects is enabled. This is an experimental feature.
%settings_platform_group1_description%: Settings pertaining to the software overall
%settings_platform_interfaceLanguage_des: Primary and any explicitly chosen fallback locales to use when localizing the interface. 'en' (English) is always the ultimate fallback if there is not a localization in a higher-priority locale.
%settings_platform_paratextDataLastRegis: ParatextData Last Registry Data Cached Times
%settings_platform_requestTimeout_descri: Number of seconds to allow internal requests to resolve. Requests that take longer than this will be aborted. Set to 0 to never abort requests.
%settings_platform_verseRef_description%: Current Verse Reference for Scroll Group A. Deprecated - please use `papi.scrollGroups` and `useWebViewScrollGroupScrRef`
%settings_platform_verseRef_label%: Current Verse Reference for Scroll Group A (Deprecated)
%settings_platform_zoomFactor_descriptio: Applies to the entire application. 1.0 is the default. Allowed range is 0.5 to 3.0.
%some_localization_key%: This is the English text for %some_localization_key%.
%toolbar_theme_loading_error%: There was a problem loading the theme
%webView_error_dump_info_message%: Need help? Share this with our tech support team to help resolve your issue.
